DOC.brief_summary: This investigator initiate , two center , randomize , evaluator-blinded , bilateral ( right vs. leave ) study photodynamic therapy subject facial actinic keratoses . Subject 's face randomize receive one four treatment : Treatment 1 , Treatment 2 , Treatment 3 Treatment 4 . Treatment 1 include microneedling perform prior ALA application right face ALA application leave face 60 minute prior BLUE light treatment 1000 second ( 16 minute 40 second ) . Treatment 2 include microneedling perform prior ALA application leave face ALA application right side face 60 minute prior BLUE light treatment 1000 second ( 16 minute 40 second ) . The face define surface skin encompass forehead hair line top eyebrow , entire nasal dorsum , cheek ( bound orbital rim , anterior border ear , jawline , nose chin ) , upper lip ( include vermilion border ) chin ( bound low edge vermilion border , cheek junction jawline ) . DOC.brief_title: Bilateral Comparison Treatment Facial Actinic Keratoses Using Microneedling Photodynamic Therapy With Aminolevulinic Acid Blue Light Versus Photodynamic Therapy With Aminolevulinic Acid Blue Light Using Two Incubation Times
DOC.criteria: Subject male nonpregnant female age 18 year . Females must postmenopausal , surgically sterile use medically acceptable form birth control , negative urine pregnancy test Baseline visit . Subject provide write verbal informed consent . Subject four ( 4 ) AK lesion side face . Subject willing comply study instruction return clinic require visit . Subject Fitzpatrick skin type IIV Subject pregnant , lactate , plan become pregnant study . Subject history cutaneous photosensitization , porphyria , hypersensitivity porphyrin photodermatosis condition associate immunosuppression ( e.g . HIV , systemic malignancy , etc. ) . Subject skin pathology condition could interfere evaluation test product require use interfere topical systemic therapy . Subject condition , , investigator 's opinion , would make unsafe subject participate research study . Subject Fitzpatrick skin type V VI . Subject currently enrol investigational drug device study . Subject receive investigational drug treat investigational device within 30 day prior initiation treatment ( baseline ) . Subject unable communicate cooperate investigator due language problem , poor mental development , impaired cerebral function . Subject may unreliable study include subject engage excessive alcohol intake drug abuse , subject unable return schedule followup visit . Subject know sensitivity one vehicle component ( ethyl alcohol , isopropyl alcohol , laureth 4 , polyethylene glycol ) . Subject need expose artificial tanning device excessive sunlight trial . Retinoids , include tazarotene , adapalene , tretinoin , retinol , within 4 week initiation treatment .
